title: Scaffolding-Based Simulation Education for Enhancing Scientific Explanation Competency in Socio-Scientific Issues (SSI)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners Role-Play as Citizens, Engaging in VR-Based Experiences of Real SSI Cases and Solving Problems Using Scientific Analysis Tools

learning_goals: Learners can accurately connect SSI's biochemical mechanisms with social contexts in over 80% of explanations
Learners write SSI analysis reports using scaffolding tools, integrating scientific evidence and social considerations in a 3:1 ratio
Learners apply a four-stage process (problem definition → scientific analysis → social impact → solution proposal) to SSI cases (e.g., food additive controversies) in VR simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
